mutants.code:
from collections import Counter
import re

def calculate_frequency(paragraph):
    processed_para = re.sub('', ' ', paragraph.lower())
    words = processed_para.split()
    word_freq = Counter(words)
    char_freq = Counter(processed_para.replace(' ', ''))
    common_word = word_freq.most_common(1)
    common_char = char_freq.most_common(1)
    return (word_freq, char_freq, common_word, common_char)

from collections import Counter
import re

def calculate_frequency(paragraph):
    processed_para = re.sub('\\W', '', paragraph.lower())
    words = processed_para.split()
    word_freq = Counter(words)
    char_freq = Counter(processed_para.replace(' ', ''))
    common_word = word_freq.most_common(1)
    common_char = char_freq.most_common(1)
    return (word_freq, char_freq, common_word, common_char)

from collections import Counter
import re

def calculate_frequency(paragraph):
    processed_para = re.sub('\\W', ' ', paragraph.lower())
    words = processed_para.split()
    word_freq = Counter(words)
    char_freq = Counter(processed_para.replace(' ', ''))
    common_word = word_freq.most_common(2)
    common_char = char_freq.most_common(1)
    return (word_freq, char_freq, common_word, common_char)

from collections import Counter
import re

def calculate_frequency(paragraph):
    processed_para = re.sub('\\W', ' ', paragraph.lower())
    words = processed_para.split()
    word_freq = Counter(words)
    char_freq = Counter(processed_para.replace(' ', ''))
    common_word = word_freq.most_common(-1)
    common_char = char_freq.most_common(1)
    return (word_freq, char_freq, common_word, common_char)

from collections import Counter
import re

def calculate_frequency(paragraph):

    char_freq = Counter(processed_para.replace(' ', ''))
    common_word = word_freq.most_common(1)
    common_char = char_freq.most_common(2)
    return (word_freq, char_freq, common_word, common_char)

from collections import Counter
import re

def calculate_frequency(paragraph):
    processed_para = re.sub('\\W', ' ', paragraph.lower())
    words = processed_para.split()
    word_freq = Counter(words)
    char_freq = Counter(processed_para.replace(' ', 'MUTATED'))
    common_word = word_freq.most_common(1)
    common_char = char_freq.most_common(1)
    return (word_freq, char_freq, common_word, common_char)
